data.definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX profiles_pkey ON public.profiles USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX locations_pkey ON public.locations USING btree (id)

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX app_config_key_key ON public.app_config USING btree (key)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cost_items_pkey ON public.cost_items USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX memberships_pkey ON public.memberships USING btree (user_id, org_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX documents_pkey ON public.documents USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX tracking_events_pkey ON public.tracking_events USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX tracking_events_shipment_id_event_time_idx ON public.tracking_events USING btree (shipment_id, event_time)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX organizations_pkey ON public.organizations USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX organization_requests_pkey ON public.organization_requests USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX organization_requests_user_id_idx ON public.organization_requests USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX organization_requests_status_idx ON public.organization_requests USING btree (status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX rate_limit_signup_pkey ON public.rate_limit_signup USING btree (ip_address)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX organization_access_log_pkey ON public.organization_access_log USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX artworks_pkey ON public.artworks USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX artworks_shipment_id_idx ON public.artworks USING btree (shipment_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_artworks_quote_id ON public.artworks USING btree (quote_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX quote_artworks_pkey ON public.quote_artworks USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_quote_artworks_quote_id ON public.quote_artworks USING btree (quote_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_quote_artworks_locked ON public.quote_artworks USING btree (locked_at) WHERE (locked_at IS NOT NULL)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX quote_shipment_map_pkey ON public.quote_shipment_map USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX quote_shipment_map_quote_id_shipment_id_key ON public.quote_shipment_map USING btree (quote_id, shipment_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_quote_shipment_map_quote ON public.quote_shipment_map USING btree (quote_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_quote_shipment_map_shipment ON public.quote_shipment_map USING btree (shipment_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_quote_shipment_map_type ON public.quote_shipment_map USING btree (relationship_type)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX organization_approved_users_pkey ON public.organization_approved_users USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX organization_approved_users_org_id_email_key ON public.organization_approved_users USING btree (org_id, email)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX quote_audit_events_pkey ON public.quote_audit_events USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_quote_audit_events_quote ON public.quote_audit_events USING btree (quote_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_quote_audit_events_type ON public.quote_audit_events USING btree (event_type)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX audit_log_pkey ON public.audit_log USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_log_table_record ON public.audit_log USING btree (table_name, record_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_log_timestamp ON public.audit_log USING btree ("timestamp" DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_log_user ON public.audit_log USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_log_action ON public.audit_log USING btree (action)
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_log_retention ON public.audit_log USING btree (retention_until) WHERE (retention_until IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_log_user_id ON public.audit_log USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX logistics_partners_pkey ON public.logistics_partners USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX logistics_partners_org_id_key ON public.logistics_partners USING btree (org_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_logistics_partners_rating ON public.logistics_partners USING btree (rating DESC)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX quotes_pkey ON public.quotes USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_quotes_owner_org_id ON public.quotes USING btree (owner_org_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_quotes_status ON public.quotes USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX idx_quotes_target_date ON public.quotes USING btree (target_date)
CREATE INDEX idx_quotes_deadline ON public.quotes USING btree (bidding_deadline)
CREATE INDEX idx_quotes_client_reference ON public.quotes USING btree (client_reference)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX shipments_pkey ON public.shipments USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX shipments_code_key ON public.shipments USING btree (code)
CREATE INDEX shipments_status_idx ON public.shipments USING btree (status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX shipments_quote_id_key ON public.shipments USING btree (quote_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_quote_id ON public.shipments USING btree (quote_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_partner ON public.shipments USING btree (logistics_partner_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_shipments_client_reference ON public.shipments USING btree (client_reference)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX bids_pkey ON public.bids USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_bids_quote_id ON public.bids USING btree (quote_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_bids_logistics_partner_id ON public.bids USING btree (logistics_partner_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_bids_status ON public.bids USING btree (status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX unique_bid_per_partner_per_quote ON public.bids USING btree (quote_id, logistics_partner_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_bids_partner ON public.bids USING btree (logistics_partner_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_bids_status_draft ON public.bids USING btree (status, is_draft)
CREATE INDEX idx_bids_quote_status ON public.bids USING btree (quote_id, status)
CREATE INDEX idx_bids_co2_estimate ON public.bids USING btree (co2_estimate)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX quote_invites_pkey ON public.quote_invites USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX quote_invites_quote_id_logistics_partner_id_key ON public.quote_invites USING btree (quote_id, logistics_partner_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_quote_invites_quote ON public.quote_invites USING btree (quote_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_quote_invites_lp ON public.quote_invites USING btree (logistics_partner_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX messages_pkey ON public.messages USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_shipment ON public.messages USING btree (shipment_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_quote ON public.messages USING btree (quote_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX bid_line_items_pkey ON public.bid_line_items USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_bid_line_items_bid ON public.bid_line_items USING btree (bid_id)

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX bid_history_pkey ON public.bid_history USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_bid_history_bid ON public.bid_history USING btree (bid_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_bid_history_timestamp ON public.bid_history USING btree ("timestamp")

data.using_qual:
((EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM ((bids b
     JOIN logistics_partners lp ON ((lp.id = b.logistics_partner_id)))
     JOIN memberships m ON ((m.org_id = lp.org_id)))
  WHERE ((b.id = bid_line_items.bid_id) AND (m.user_id = auth.uid())))) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM ((bids b
     JOIN quotes q ON ((q.id = b.quote_id)))
     JOIN memberships m ON ((m.org_id = q.owner_org_id)))
  WHERE ((b.id = bid_line_items.bid_id) AND (m.user_id = auth.uid()) AND (b.show_breakdown = true) AND (b.is_draft = false)))))

((EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM ((bids b
     JOIN logistics_partners lp ON ((lp.id = b.logistics_partner_id)))
     JOIN memberships m ON ((m.org_id = lp.org_id)))
  WHERE ((b.id = bid_history.bid_id) AND (m.user_id = auth.uid())))) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM ((bids b
     JOIN quotes q ON ((q.id = b.quote_id)))
     JOIN memberships m ON ((m.org_id = q.owner_org_id)))
  WHERE ((b.id = bid_history.bid_id) AND (m.user_id = auth.uid())))))

((EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM (logistics_partners lp
     JOIN memberships m ON ((m.org_id = lp.org_id)))
  WHERE ((lp.id = bids.logistics_partner_id) AND (m.user_id = auth.uid())))) OR (((is_draft = false) OR (is_draft IS NULL)) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM (quotes q
     JOIN memberships m ON ((m.org_id = q.owner_org_id)))
  WHERE ((q.id = bids.quote_id) AND (m.user_id = auth.uid()))))))

data.with_check:
((EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM (logistics_partners lp
     JOIN memberships m ON ((m.org_id = lp.org_id)))
  WHERE ((lp.id = bids.logistics_partner_id) AND (m.user_id = auth.uid())))) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM quotes q
  WHERE ((q.id = bids.quote_id) AND (q.status = ANY (ARRAY['draft'::quote_status, 'active'::quote_status])) AND ((q.bidding_deadline IS NULL) OR (q.bidding_deadline > now())) AND ((q.type = 'auction'::quote_type) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
           FROM quote_invites qi
          WHERE ((qi.quote_id = q.id) AND (qi.logistics_partner_id = bids.logistics_partner_id)))))))))

data.using_qual:
CASE
    WHEN (table_name = 'shipments'::text) THEN (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
       FROM (shipments s
         JOIN memberships m ON ((m.org_id = s.owner_org_id)))
      WHERE ((s.id = audit_log.record_id) AND (m.user_id = auth.uid()))))
    WHEN (table_name = 'quotes'::text) THEN (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
       FROM (quotes q
         JOIN memberships m ON ((m.org_id = q.owner_org_id)))
      WHERE ((q.id = audit_log.record_id) AND (m.user_id = auth.uid()))))
    WHEN (table_name = ANY (ARRAY['organizations'::text, 'memberships'::text, 'organization_requests'::text])) THEN (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
       FROM memberships m
      WHERE ((m.user_id = auth.uid()) AND (((audit_log.table_name = 'organizations'::text) AND (m.org_id = audit_log.record_id)) OR ((audit_log.table_name = 'memberships'::text) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
               FROM memberships m2
              WHERE ((m2.user_id = audit_log.record_id) AND (m2.org_id = m.org_id)))))))))
    ELSE (user_id = auth.uid())
END

   FROM shipments s
  WHERE ((s.id = messages.shipment_id) AND ((s.owner_org_id IN ( SELECT memberships.org_id
           FROM memberships
          WHERE (memberships.user_id = auth.uid()))) OR (s.logistics_partner_id IN ( SELECT lp.id

             JOIN memberships m ON ((m.org_id = lp.org_id)))
          WHERE (m.user_id = auth.uid())))))))) OR ((quote_id IS NOT NULL) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1

             JOIN memberships m ON ((m.org_id = lp.org_id)))
          WHERE (m.user_id = auth.uid())))))))))
